name: The Rise Of Slime Village(Hard Platformer)
name_original: The Rise Of Slime Village(Hard Platformer)
description:
Story of Game

In one Little Village of Little Slimes, one villain came every month. He came here because he wanted to take over this village. Every month he came and took away some of the villagers. The inhabitants were frightened. They tried to conserve the resources of their village. One day, the inhabitants suddenly saw that an earthquake had begun in their village, since the villain began to send his assistants. Our Main Hero saw all this chaos and he told the monster to stop it all. But the monster said that he would give him 3 days and if the hero did not have time to defeat him, then the village would be captured. And after that he left. All the Residents were scared. But the hero had an inventor friend. He could create robots. Our Hero went in search of a friend. He found him and a friend began to build robots that would protect the village, and our hero went to defeat the main invader of the village.

Adventure Begins!!!

                                                                       Ideas(Description)

You control a hero who must protect his village of slimes from the hands of a villain. Along the way, you will fight against the monsters of the villain. In order to protect the village, you need to find an old friend of the hero. Both of them must protect the village until the villain takes over the village itself. Don't let the villain take over the village. Good luck!
